title: Roasted: Verdens Sjoveste Ferie
overview: Linda P has invited 5 of Denmark´s funniest comedians on a holiday in sunny Marbella. Along she brings a suitcase with embarrassing ammunition from the comedians ‘past. Every evening, they take turns in the hot seat to get roasted by their colleagues. It´s a war of words with lots of surprises and laughs - because how far can you really go when it comes to jokes?
